alert.note: Alert for Loudon; Morgan; Roane (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 1:53PM CDT until July 29 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Morgan County in east Tennessee... North central Loudon County in east Tennessee... Central Roane County in east Tennessee... * Until 345 PM EDT. * At 253 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Midtown, or near Kingston, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Oak Ridge, Lenoir City, Kingston, Rockwood, Loudon, Midtown, Harriman, Oakdale, Bradbury and Dearmond. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 in Tennessee between mile markers 342 and 368. Interstate 75 in Tennessee between mile markers 73 and 83. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
